Author: CaptainMyCaptainRise
Text: Hey I've tried that but shift work makes it difficult to plan stuff but I'll try again, thank you friend ðŸ˜Š

Author: crazyrunner92
Text: Maybe instead of restricting (which inevitably leads to binging), try eating balanced, healthy, and filling meals and allowing one treat from work per day to fit in to your meals? Or maybe eat a nice meal before work so you're not hungry and your willpower will be higher. Bring meals/snacks to work for long shifts and maybe you'll be less tempted to eat the work food?
